Class TextField

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Menus
        • TextField

  • public class TextField
extends Menus
    Write a description of class TextField here.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextField()
      Creates a new TextField of a default size of 250 x 50 with black letters on white background.
      TextField(int width, int height)
      Creates a new TextField of the given size with black letters on white background.

      Creates a new TextField of the given size with black letters on white background.

      Creates a new TextField of the given size, the given colors and a starting text.

      Creates a new TextField of the given size, the given colors and a starting text.

      Creates a new TextField of the given size with black letters on white background and a starting text.

      Creates a new TextField of the given size and the given colors.

      Creates a new TextField with a default size of 250 x 50 with black letters on white background and a starting text.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextField

        public TextField()
        Creates a new TextField of a default size of 250 x 50 with black letters on white background.

      • TextField

        public TextField(java.lang.String text)
        Creates a new TextField with a default size of 250 x 50 with black letters on white background and a starting text.
        Parameters:
        text - The text that is shown directly.

      • TextField

        public TextField(java.lang.String text,
                 boolean enabled)
        Creates a new TextField with a default size of 250 x 50 with black letters on white background and a starting text.
        Parameters:
        text - The text that is shown directly.
        enabled - If you want the textfield to be enabled (able to write in it) this boolean has to be true.

      • TextField

        public TextField(int width,
                 int height)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new TextField of the given size with black letters on white background.
        Parameters:
        width - The TextFields width (which has to be greater than 50).
        height - The TextFields height (which has to be greater than 20).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • TextField

                 int height,
                 boolean enabled)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new TextField of the given size with black letters on white background.
        Parameters:
        width - The TextFields width (which has to be greater than 50).
        height - The TextFields height (which has to be greater than 20).
        enabled - If you want the textfield to be enabled (able to write in it) this boolean has to be true.

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

                 int height,
                 java.lang.String text)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        height - The TextFields height (which has to be greater than 20).

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • TextField

        public TextField(int width,
                 int height,
                 boolean displayKeyNames,
                 java.lang.String text)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new TextField of the given size with black letters on white background and a starting text.
        Parameters:
        width - The TextFields width (which has to be greater than 50).
        height - The TextFields height (which has to be greater than 20).
        displayKeyNames - If you want to use the textfield for only one key this parameter has to be true.
        text - The text that is shown directly.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • TextField

        public TextField(int width,
                 int height,
                 java.awt.Color bgColor,
                 java.awt.Color textColor)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new TextField of the given size and the given colors.
        Parameters:
        width - The TextFields width (which has to be greater than 50).
        height - The TextFields height (which has to be greater than 20).
        bgColor - The color of the TextFields background.
        textColor - The color of the text.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • TextField

        public TextField(int width,
                 int height,
                 boolean displayKeyNames,
                 boolean enabled,
                 java.awt.Color bgColor,
                 java.awt.Color textColor,
                 java.lang.String text)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new TextField of the given size, the given colors and a starting text.
        Parameters:
        width - The TextFields width (which has to be greater than 50).
        height - The TextFields height (which has to be greater than 20).
        displayKeyNames - If you want to use the textfield for only one key this parameter has to be true.
        enabled - If you want the textfield to be enabled (able to write in it) this boolean has to be true.
        bgColor - The color of the TextFields background.
        textColor - The color of the text.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Check whether this textfield is enabled (if you can change the text in it).
        Returns:
        Returns true if the text field is enabled.
